phase.Description: Experimental phase during which the trial occurred

trialtype.Description: Pair type during the study phase

category.Description: Category of the linking (B) item in the pair presented on the trial

pairnum.Description: Identifier for the stimulus pair in the trial. This can be used to match trials from the same triad (ABC)

fix_x_pos.Description: Horizontal position of the fixation on the screen

fix_y_pos.Description: Vertical position of the fixation on the screen

fix_start_time.Description: System time when the fixation began

fix_end_time.Description: System time when the fixation ended

fix_dwell_time.Description: Total duration of fixation within the interest area (fix_end_time - fix_start_time)

ia_side.Description: Label indicating the side of the screen where the interest area of the current fixation was located

ia_item_category.Description: Category of the item in the interest area

ia_item_type.Description: Type of item in the interest area, as labeled in the study phase
